headline: Here's What Key Metrics Tell Us About PPL (PPL) Q2 Earnings
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for PPL (PPL) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

raw.headline: Here's What Key Metrics Tell Us About PPL (PPL) Q2 Earnings

headline: PPL Electric ‘advanced-stage’ data center pipeline grows 32%, to 14 GW
summary: PPL supports legislation in Pennsylvania that would allow utilities to own power plants, CEO Vince Sorgi said.
